title: Scripter?

embed.description: Playing him in ranked, did this about 9 times before i said scripter in all chat lol

body: Playing against him in ranked, he did this exact thing about 7 times. The instant i q's him, windwall would go up, inhuman reactions. Then i said "scripting?" in all chat and then he started to use his windwall really late in fights to try to show he wasnt (he obviously turned them off). What do you guys think?

replies.body: Maybe he mains anivia and knows the animation before she Qs
he used it within 0.1 of a second...

Think about this:

His tornado has a cast time, before it gets sent out he does a slight "HEGOOGAA" or something, and then it will go off.

Most Yasuo's can take advantage of this cast time (not channel time) and send his wall out along with it against skillshot based opponents (Anivia). 

A player will very rarely give up their scripts to prove their enemy wrong... you are just experiencing - well - an experienced player. I have watched the clip many times and he starts the cancelling tornado windwall cast animation over half way through your channel time. Now, he was casting his tornado at the start, so it is entirely possible that he is scripting and it had a delay.

Maybe he is using macro scripts for the incredibly fast cast time between Q and W. But I don't think he is windwall scripting.

Yeah he did this about 9 times though, without the q the other times, my recording software broke so i dont have the other times but riot should be able to access the replay, its pretty obvious from the others.

The biggest giveaway is when you use a champion with a boomerang ability, and then put the windwall up on the way back because it's just come off cooldown, to protect nothing.

As for this, a lot of yasuo's use the wall as they send out a knockup Q.

If you had a different video maybe it would be proof.
